holdings.reasoning_summary: Harmonious construction of Chapter III of RPA; trial commences on reference to tribunal under s.86 and includes preliminary objections under s.90(3); order dismisses petition at conclusion of trial like s.98(a); supported by ss.99,103,106,107; confirmed by Act 58/1958 explanation

anchor.surface_text: That is the view which the Madhya Pradesh High Court has taken in Gulshar Ahmed v. Election Tribunal 1  and it was this decision which was followed by the High Court in the present proceedings. In our opinion, therefore, the contention raised by the appellant that the appeal preferred by respondent I before the High Court was incompetent must be rejected.
